title: Mannequin
description: Viola ventures into the big city from a small, close-knit community only to find herself in a dull, temporary office job. Every day she takes the subway, wears the same conservative attire, until a collision with a strikingly handsome stranger changes everything from the moment they meet during the morning traffic rush. With a sense of adventure in tow, a timid yet curious Viola enters a new realm of sexual pleasure never before imagined....and just as she adjusts little by little to each step in her journey, the twists and plotting of her transition continue beyond her wildest imagination...
author: Vicki C. Smith
